title: urf
body:
Anyone know of a LOL Server that plays URF NONE STOP????
if not im keen to create and fund one

replies.body:
You can't create servers for league?

And besides, having URF in rotation is good, if you play something for too long it gets boring and tiresome.
So having it every now and again makes it feel rewarding. and worth the wait.

FOR YOU. Why can't some people just accept that others have a different style of game.

These people don't see URF as a special treat - they see it as a full game, instead of the normal League of Legends. If there was a game exactly like URF with all the same champions, items, abilities, etc, they would play it nonstop, because yes, it is funner.

For the rest of the League community however, URF is a special event not meant to be here forever. URF is some peoples style, League is another game to be honest. I don't play League that much anymore but I do during the special gamemodes. If they were there own game, I wouldn't be here. But they are part of League, and some people just love them, and not in a once a year way.
There are none. The only way servers have access to urf is through the rotating gamemode queue.
